publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4855 Donald Gorrie: COPD Clinical Guidelines—That the Parliament congratulates the Association of the British Pharmaceutical Industry on its new publication, Target COPD, which draws attention to the extent of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease in Britain and supports the call of the British Lung Foundation for NHS Quality Improvement Scotland to introduce COPD clinical standards into its work programme to ensure that patients can have access to the best quality treatment and care services at the earliest opportunity. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-4855 COPD Clinical Guidelines (lodged on 26 September 2006) Tommy Sheridan*

S2M-4855 Donald Gorrie: COPD Clinical Guidelines—That the Parliament congratulates the Association of the British Pharmaceutical Industry on its new publication, Target COPD, which draws attention to the extent of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease in Britain and supports the call of the British Lung Foundation for NHS Quality Improvement Scotland to introduce COPD clinical standards into its work programme to ensure that patients can have access to the best quality treatment and care services at the earliest opportunity. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan
S2M-4855 COPD Clinical Guidelines (lodged on 26 September 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Mike Pringle*, Carolyn Leckie*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Murray Tosh*
S2M-4855 COPD Clinical Guidelines (lodged on 26 September 2006) Mr David Davidson*, Dave Petrie*, Euan Robson*, Shiona Baird*, Robin Harper*, Trish Godman*, Bruce Crawford*
S2M-4855 COPD Clinical Guidelines (lodged on 26 September 2006) Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-4855 COPD Clinical Guidelines (lodged on 26 September 2006) Dennis Canavan*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-4855 COPD Clinical Guidelines (lodged on 26 September 2006) Mr Andrew Welsh*
S2M-4855 COPD Clinical Guidelines (lodged on 26 September 2006) Eleanor Scott*
S2M-4855 COPD Clinical Guidelines (lodged on 26 September 2006) Frances Curran*
